titles.title: Historic Natchez Bluffs Stabilization Act
To require the Secretary of the Army to carry out such activities as are necessary to stabilize the bluffs along the Mississippi River in the vicinity of Natchez, Mississippi, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2417)
Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

bill.summary: 10/13/1993--Introduced. Historic Natchez Bluffs Stabilization Act - Directs the Secretary of the Army to carry out activities to stabilize the bluffs along the Mississippi River in the vicinity of Natchez, Mississippi. Authorizes appropriations.
